mapper.select: select * from GCGL_SH where sbyf=#{sbyf} and jhid=#{jhid}
mapper.update: update GCGL_SH set sfsj=#{sfsj} where id=#{id}
update GCGL_SH set shuser=#{shuser},shtime=#{shtime},zjje=#{zjje},xgcsyj=#{xgcsyj},shzt='已审核' where id=#{id} and jhid=#{jhid}
mapper.select: select * from GCGL_CGS where tbyf=#{tbyf} and jhid=#{jhid}
mapper.update: update GCGL_CGS set cgsdwzj=#{cgsdwzj},tbyf=#{tbyf},cscyj=#{cscyj},stz=#{stz},sz=#{sz},gz=#{gz},yhdk=#{yhdk} where id=#{id} and jhid=#{jhid}
mapper.select: select ${tiaojian} tiaojian,${lxmc} sgxkwjfile from PLAN_SHUIH where id=#{jhid}
mapper.update: update PLAN_SHUIH set WJGYY=#{wjgyy} where id=#{jhid}
update JHSH_SH set SJWGSJ=#{sjwgsj},JGZT=#{jgzt} where xmbm=#{jhid}
mapper.select:
select * from ( select m.*,rownum rn from ( select t1.lxmc,t1.lxbm,t1.xzqhdm,t1.xzqhmc,t1.jsdd,t1.gydw,t1.gydwbm,t1.bhnr,t1.qdzh,t1.zdzh,t1.qzlc,t1.yhlc,t1.ylmlx,t1.bz lxbz,t1.yjsdj,t2.id jhid, t2.fapgdw,t2.fascdw,t2.faspsj,t2.spwh,t2.tzgs,t2.jsxz,t2.jsnr,t2.jhbz,t2.id id,t2.wjgyy,t2.scbz, t2.sbnf,t2.jhkgsj,t2.jhwgsj,t2.xmmc,t2.lmkd,t2.sftqss,t2.sjdw,t2.yhlb,t2.dc,t2.jc,t2.mc,t2.sjpfdw,t2.pfwh,t2.pfsj,t2.pfztz,t2.jhsybzje,t2.jhsydfzcje,t2.sjlmlx,t2.sfsqablbz,t2.ablbzsqwh,t2.sfgyhbm,t2.gkbgmc,t2.sjsgtmc,t2.xdsj,t2.sjkgsj,t2.sjwgsj,t2.kgzt,t2.jgzt,t2.yjwgsj,t2.sfqxkg,t2.jsdw,t2.sgdw,t2.jldw,t2.htje,t2.sgxkwj,t2.jgtcwj,t2.jgyswj,t2.wjsczt,t2.gsztz from PLAN_LX_SHUIH t1 left join PLAN_SHUIH t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where t2.spzt='1'
${gydw}
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t2.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and ${tiaojian} like '%'||trim(#{shzt})||'%'
order by t2.sbnf ) m where rownum<=(#{page} * #{rows}) ) where RN>((#{page} - 1) * #{rows})

select count(*) from PLAN_LX_SHUIH t1 left join PLAN_SHUIH t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where t2.spzt='1'
${gydw}
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t2.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and ${tiaojian} like '%'||trim(#{shzt})||'%'
select sgxkwj,jgtcwj,jgyswj from PLAN_SHUIH where id=#{jhid}
mapper.update: update JHSH_SH set sjzt=#{sjzt} where xmbm=#{jhid}
update JHSH_SH set xjzt=#{xjzt} where xmbm=#{jhid}
update PLAN_SHUIH set zdyf=#{sbyf} where id=#{jhid}
update JHSH_SH set sjsh=#{sjsh} where xmbm=#{jhid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from GCGL_SH where jhid=#{jhid} and sfsj=#{yhtype} and shzt='未审核'
select max(sbyf) sbyf from gcgl_sh where jhid=#{jhid}

select * from ( select rownum num ,t.*,s.sl sl from JHSH_SH t left join (select count(*) sl, xmid xmbm from lxsh_lx where jdbs='2' group by xmid) s on t.xmbm=s.xmbm where 1=1
and t.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t.xmbm like trim(#{sbnf})||'%'
and ${tiaojian} like '%'||trim(#{shzt})||'%'
and lxsh.tsdq like '%'||trim(#{tsdq})||'%'
and t.xmmc like '%'||trim(#{xmmc})||'%'
and t.xmbm in ( select xmid from lxsh_lx where 1=1
${gydw}
and lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
and xjsdj like '%'||trim(#{jsdj})||'%'
and lxbm like trim(#{gldj})||'%'
) ) t2 where t2.num <=(#{page} * #{rows}) and t2.num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows} order by xmbm

select count(*) from JHSH_SH t where 1=1
and t.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t.xmbm like trim(#{sbnf})||'%'
and ${tiaojian} like '%'||trim(#{shzt})||'%'
and lxsh.tsdq like '%'||trim(#{tsdq})||'%'
and t.xmmc like '%'||trim(#{xmmc})||'%'
and t.xmbm in ( select xmid from lxsh_lx where 1=1
${gydw}
and lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
and xjsdj like '%'||trim(#{jsdj})||'%'
and lxbm like trim(#{gldj})||'%'
)

select * from ( select rownum num ,t.*,s.sl sl from JHSH_SH t left join xmsq_sh lxsh on t.xmbm=lxsh.xmbm left join (select count(*) sl, xmid xmbm from lxsh_lx where jdbs='2' group by xmid) s on t.xmbm=s.xmbm left join (select * from gcgl_cgs where tbyf=#{tbyf}) c on t.xmbm=c.jhid left join (select (case when tb1.ztz<=tb2.ztz then '已全部拨付' else '未全部拨付' end) ljbfzt,tb1.xmid from(select sum(pz.xdzj) ztz,xmid from plan_zjxd pz group by pz.xmid) tb1, (select sum(gc.cgsdwzj+gc.stz) ztz,jhid from gcgl_cgs gc group by gc.jhid) tb2 where tb1.xmid=tb2.jhid) tb3 on t.xmbm=tb3.xmid where 1=1
and c.tbyf is null
and c.tbyf is not null
and t.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t.xmbm like trim(#{sbnf})||'%'
and lxsh.tsdq like '%'||trim(#{tsdq})||'%'
and tb3.ljbfzt like '%'||trim(#{ljbfzt})||'%'
and tb3.ljbfzt like '%'||trim(#{ljbfzt})||'%' or tb3.ljbfzt is null
and t.xmmc like '%'||trim(#{xmmc})||'%'
and t.xmbm in ( select xmid from lxsh_lx where 1=1
${gydw}
and lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
and xjsdj like '%'||trim(#{jsdj})||'%'
and lxbm like trim(#{gldj})||'%'
) ) t2 where t2.num <=(#{page} * #{rows}) and t2.num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows} order by xmbm

select count(*) from JHSH_SH t left join xmsq_sh lxsh on t.xmbm=lxsh.xmbm left join (select count(*) sl, xmid xmbm from lxsh_lx where jdbs='2' group by xmid) s on t.xmbm=s.xmbm left join (select * from gcgl_cgs where tbyf=#{tbyf}) c on t.xmbm=c.jhid left join (select (case when tb1.ztz<=tb2.ztz then '已全部拨付' else '未全部拨付' end) ljbfzt,tb1.xmid from(select sum(pz.xdzj) ztz,xmid from plan_zjxd pz group by pz.xmid) tb1, (select sum(gc.cgsdwzj+gc.stz) ztz,jhid from gcgl_cgs gc group by gc.jhid) tb2 where tb1.xmid=tb2.jhid) tb3 on t.xmbm=tb3.xmid where 1=1
and c.tbyf is null
and c.tbyf is not null
and t.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t.jgzt like '%'||trim(#{jgzt})||'%'
and t.xmbm like trim(#{sbnf})||'%'
and lxsh.tsdq like '%'||trim(#{tsdq})||'%'
and tb3.ljbfzt like '%'||trim(#{ljbfzt})||'%'
and tb3.ljbfzt like '%'||trim(#{ljbfzt})||'%' or tb3.ljbfzt is null
and t.xmmc like '%'||trim(#{xmmc})||'%'
and t.xmbm in ( select xmid from lxsh_lx where 1=1
${gydw}
and lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
and xjsdj like '%'||trim(#{jsdj})||'%'
and lxbm like trim(#{gldj})||'%'
)
